dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2521 : South Carolina Peanut Parity Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to include South Carolina as a part of the Virginia/Carolina peanut producing region for purposes of appointment to the Peanut Standards Board.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the South Carolina Peanut Parity Act of 2017.

section.header: South Carolina inclusion in Virginia/Carolina peanut producing region
section.text: Section 1308(c)(2)(B)(iii) of the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 (7 U.S.C. 7958(c)(2)(B)(iii)) is amended by striking Virginia and North Carolina and inserting Virginia, North Carolina, and South Carolina.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives October 31, 2017.
